title: LF top and mid players for rank 5s + online tournaments [Diamond +]
body:
Hi, Team Jellyfish Pirates is looking for TOP and MID players who can play constantly. our rank team currently is plat 3 with a 8W 1L
If you are diamond 4+, please add **oJP ooXX** for further convo.{{summoner:7}} 

1) communication is key - perf skype and mic
2) willing to practice at least 3days per week

oJP ooXX
